title: A funerall ellegie, upon the death of Mr. John Pim one of the worthy Members of the house of Commons deceased the 8 of December.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Hammond according to order,
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse - "Hath Fate, and Time, conspird, to send thee Death,".
Contains an acrostic on his name, and an epitaph.
L (Luttrell) Copy stained and torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
